name: Sproxil
overview: Sproxil offers an anti-counterfeiting strategy for cash-based societies. The product was initially developed for pharmaceutical drugs, but has expanded into software xand other authenticated The Delivering automatic protection, simple labels and robust back-end analytics with its Mobile Product AuthenticationTM (MPA) solution, Sproxil enables consumers to text message an item-unique code for a rapid response that confirms a brand’s genuineness. The product also helps companies connect directly to their consumers through customized text message responses - such as health management tips - and ads that specifically target those demographics with known buying behaviors.
